name: Jon Crowley
description: Am active man with a great sense of humor who enjoys all types of music, nature, physical fitness, dancing and singing. I would like to meet a special woman who loves life, learns and grows from her life experiences, and has fun in the process. I am looking for a stable, self-confident partner who I can have fun with. A person who likes meaningful conversation. A person who could help make this journey of life full of wonder and excitment but also be ready to handle all of the ups and downs that come our way. I want a woman to want me in every way TOTALLY, to be able to sit in silence..enjoying a cup of coffee or watching a sunset ….to feel comfort in silence, just feeling the love flowing between us. I also want to feel erotic sensual moments feeling the hot passion. Having her smile melt my heart all the way into my soul leaving me with the feeling of wanting to always give to please. I truly look forward to meeting you my ideal life partner.
